comment.author: 9134056@N05
comment._content:
Are there any short simple  Biographies of people featured ?
for the Lay person coming across these photos ?
Context of pictures  - etc ?
0ther than to search thru Wikipedia (if there) ?

comment.author: 35128489@N07
comment._content:
Hi Cardwellpics

Many thanks for your comments- yes from the feedback that we have received we are planning to add more information to some of the images.  For some of the pictures we have no more details than appear on the site, and we are encouraging past and present students and staff of the LSE to comment on the pictures so that we can gather more background knowledge.
